Entries.eventSeen_733330_memory_oneday: Sam and Sabrina asked me to play drums in their band... I've never played drums before, but it's actually pretty fun.#$e#You have to learn how to move your limbs to different rhythms, at the same exact time. I feel like my brain is growing.$h
Entries.eventSeen_2_memory_oneday: Sabrina mentioned that she heard strange music while having dinner the other night...#$e#I didn't tell her it was us! It seemed better to keep it a mystery.$h
Entries.dating_Sebastian_memory_oneday: I heard you and Sabrina started dating... I didn't realize you guys had a thing...$6
Entries.married_Sebastian: Congratulations on the marriage. I guess this means Sabrina won't be moving to the city like she always talked about.$6#$b#That'll be nice. I'd be kind of sad if I never saw her again. We've always been good friends.$6

Entries.eventSeen_733330_memory_oneday: Samantha and Sabrina asked me to play drums in their band... I've never played drums before, but it's actually pretty fun.#$e#You have to learn how to move your limbs to different rhythms, at the same exact time. I feel like my brain is growing.$h
Entries.eventSeen_2_memory_oneday: Sabrina mentioned that she heard strange music while having dinner the other night...#$e#I didn't tell her it was us! It seemed better to keep it a mystery.$h
Entries.dating_Sebastian_memory_oneday: I heard you and Sabrina started dating... I didn't realize you guys had a thing...$6
Entries.married_Sebastian: Congratulations on the marriage. I guess this means Sabrina won't be moving to the city like she always talked about.$6#$b#That'll be nice. I'd be kind of sad if I never saw her again. We've always been good friends.$6

Entries.winter_Sat: There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that girl Sabrina. Why does she wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it.

Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with Sabrina before we met. She was probably the one...$s

Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Dad's been tracking the weather patterns for the last twenty years.#$e#It's a little too early to tell, but the results have revealed some abnormal trends.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: One of the best things about living on the farm is waking up to a chorus of songbirds.
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is flawless. This is a very rare specimen!$l
Entries.funReturn_Maru: Mom and Dad are doing just fine. Their routine is still the same, even with me gone. How was your day?
Entries.spring_22: If my sister wasn't such a hermit I'd invite her over for dinner sometime.
Entries.summer_20: I wonder if my sister will ever have the courage to ask Abigail out?
Entries.fall_1: With every season, a new section of the night sky becomes prominent. It's fascinating to witness.
Entries.winter_5: I hope Dad's doing okay... he can get depressed in winter, when there's less opportunity for field research.

Entries.spring_22: If my sister wasn't such a hermit I'd invite her over for dinner sometime.
Entries.summer_20: I wonder if my sister will ever have the courage to ask Abel out?
Entries.fall_1: With every season, a new section of the night sky becomes prominent. It's fascinating to witness.
Entries.winter_5: I hope Dad's doing okay... he can get depressed in winter, when there's less opportunity for field research.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Do you think Sabrina and Abigail will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be cool to see Sabrina again.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Aw, man. These cloudy days are kind of a drag...$7
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Earlier, I listened to our live recording from that show we played. Remember that? Man, was that sloppy.#$b#It made me a little nervous that you were there, I didn't want to mess up and have you think I was a loser!$10
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I hope Vincent's not too lonely now that I'm gone... I kinda felt responsible for the little guy.$s#$e#But, life's all about change... right? Kids need to learn that, eventually... Or else adulthood will destroy them.$7
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Do you have big plans for the day?#$e#Oh, not me... I usually decide what to do a few moments beforehand...
Entries.OneKid_1: It's weird, but I really like being a father!$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: I never thought I'd become such a family man, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great.$h
Entries.Good_4: Baby, I was just gonna write you a song on the guitar. But now you're here and I feel relaxed.#$e#I mainly feel like playing guitar when I'm lonely.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Do you think Sabrina and Abel will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Hey. I was just thinking about my old room in the basement. I felt comfortable there, but this is a lot more interesting. And I don't miss the smell...#$e#I felt kind of embarrassed living in my mom's house for so long.
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: The older I get, the less I'm drawn to the city. It had a certain mystique to it, once. But it turns out that was just a romantic fantasy.#$e#The city's so busy, so full of people... I don't belong there. I'm a loner.
Entries.Outdoor_1: Hmm... sometimes I have to force myself to stay outside for health.#$e#I dunno what it is, but I like being indoors. Maybe I'm just so used to my dark basement.
Entries.Outdoor_3: I don't want to get soft now that I'm a married girl. Maybe I should start eating more hot pepper and working out?#$e#Just an idea...$h
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to being a mother. Don't worry, I'll take good care of %kid1! It's just... something new.
Entries.TwoKids_2: I've had this recurring dream that %kid2 is wearing a shadow shaman costume and sitting on a glowing pumpkin. Weird, huh?
Entries.Good_9: I don't really need friends. You're the only person I need in my life. Is that weird?#$e#I guess I'm not like most people.
Entries.Bad_6: What do you want? You sound like my step-dad. Go away.$a
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? Do we have to go?#$e#I hate wearing that ridiculous dress. Why does Lewis make us do this?$s

Entries.married_Sebastian: Hey, I guess we're brother and sister now!$h^Hey, I guess we're sisters now!$h#$e#I'm glad that Sabrina found a way out of the basement...#$e#I wish you two all the best!
Entries.summer_Tue: Sabrina is my half-sister, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
Entries.summer_Tue4: Sabrina hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if she even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a sister but she doesn't act like one.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)337: Oh, wow! That's a rare element. It's theorized that all the iridium in our world comes from meteorites...$h
Entries.dating_Maru: Ummm... Don't break the news to my Dad, okay? I'll handle it.
Entries.GreenRain: I want to go collect samples with my dad, but my Mom is insisting we stay here...
Entries.GreenRain_2: This is a rare opportunity to study a unique phenomenon... every moment counts!
Entries.Resort_Entering: Willy mentioned that you helped fix the boat. Thanks for doing that!
Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harvey's clinic.#$b#He says he likes having me around in case his medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Entries.Sat: Do you know my Dad, Demetrius? He's a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping him out in the laboratory.
Entries.Sat6: If you think about the human body, it's hard to believe that somehow, it all just 'works'.
Entries.Sat8: You know, I was thinking... even with all the technology in the world, nothing beats having a real human friend.
Entries.Fri4: My mother is a carpenter and my dad is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
Entries.event_robot_explain1: ...$s#$b#You have a point, I did program her to act human... but her neural net is so complex, I can't be sure conciousness didn't emerge on its own.$8#$b#Furthermore, isn't it a little arrogant to assume that human-like consciousness is the only worthwhile vessel of existence? Computer brains are different than ours, but that doesn't mean we can disregard them.$8
Entries.summer_1: This is going to be a great season for stargazing.
Entries.summer_Wed: Are you enjoying the season?#$e#It's been so warm this year.$h
Entries.summer_Wed4: Penny and I have been doing a seasonal book club.#$b#It's just the two of us, but it's still fun to discuss what we're reading!
Entries.summer_Sun: I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#Dad says a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
Entries.fall_Fri: I bet we'll start seeing more people at the clinic this season.$s#$e#I hope everyone stays healthy.
Entries.winter_Mon: Did you see the snowman I built?$h
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go but my Dad would flip.
Entries.winter_Mon8: Hi @!$h#$e#Hey, don't you think my snowman looks kind of like you?

Entries.married_Sebastian: Hey, I guess we're brothers now!$h^Hey, I guess we're brother and sister now!$h#$e#I'm glad that Sabrina found a way out of the basement...#$e#I wish you two all the best!
Entries.summer_Tue: Sabrina is my half-sister, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
Entries.summer_Tue4: Sabrina hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if she even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a sister but she doesn't act like one.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)337: Oh, wow! That's a rare element. It's theorized that all the iridium in our world comes from meteorites...$h
Entries.dating_Maru: Ummm... Don't break the news to my Dad, okay? I'll handle it.
Entries.GreenRain: I want to go collect samples with my dad, but my Mom is insisting we stay here...
Entries.GreenRain_2: This is a rare opportunity to study a unique phenomenon... every moment counts!
Entries.Resort_Entering: Willy mentioned that you helped fix the boat. Thanks for doing that!
Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harriet's clinic.#$b#She says she likes having me around in case her medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Entries.Sat: Do you know my Dad, Demetrius? He's a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping him out in the laboratory.
Entries.Sat6: If you think about the human body, it's hard to believe that somehow, it all just 'works'.
Entries.Sat8: You know, I was thinking... even with all the technology in the world, nothing beats having a real human friend.
Entries.Fri4: My mother is a carpenter and my dad is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
Entries.event_robot_explain1: ...$s#$b#You have a point, I did program her to act human... but her neural net is so complex, I can't be sure conciousness didn't emerge on its own.$8#$b#Furthermore, isn't it a little arrogant to assume that human-like consciousness is the only worthwhile vessel of existence? Computer brains are different than ours, but that doesn't mean we can disregard them.$8
Entries.summer_1: This is going to be a great season for stargazing.
Entries.summer_Wed: Are you enjoying the season?#$e#It's been so warm this year.$h
Entries.summer_Wed4: Peter and I have been doing a seasonal book club.#$b#It's just the two of us, but it's still fun to discuss what we're reading!
Entries.summer_Sun: I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#Dad says a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
Entries.fall_Fri: I bet we'll start seeing more people at the clinic this season.$s#$e#I hope everyone stays healthy.
Entries.winter_Mon: Did you see the snowman I built?$h
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go but my Dad would flip.
Entries.winter_Mon8: Hi @!$h#$e#Hey, don't you think my snowman looks kind of like you?

Entries.divorced_Sebastian: Sabrina's back in the basement... what happened between you two?$s
Entries.married_Sebastian: Oh, don't worry... these are tears of joy. I know Sabrina will be very happy on %farm Farm!$h
Entries.Fri: You've met my daughter Sabrina, right? She lives downstairs.#$e#She's a little shy, but I'm sure she'll warm up to you if you're nice to her.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sabrina's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sabrina... she doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about her future very much...#$e#I would talk to her about it but she never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: Sabrina told me she's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of her.
Entries.GreenRain: That man is insane! Why does he have to go out there? We have no idea if this rain is dangerous!$u%noturn
Entries.houseUpgrade_2: What are you going to do with all that new space in your house?#$e#Or perhaps I should call it... your 'mansion'?$h
Entries.structureBuilt_Fish Pond: I mentioned to Willy that you got a new fish pond. He seemed really happy about it.#$e#Apparently, he raised crabs when he was a young man. Called it a 'time-honored tradition'.$h
Entries.cc_Complete: I knew it from the moment you stepped off that bus, @... you were destined to be a town hero!$h
Entries.Sun: I hope Demetrius doesn't blow the house up with those science experiments of his.#$e#I'm not even sure what he's working on. I think it has something to do with plants.
Entries.Sun2: #$1 RobinDem#My husband almost set the house on fire last night with his science experiment. One of his beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.$u#$e#Sorry if it smells weird in here, @. It's my husband's bizarre science project...
Entries.fall_Fri: Have you met the wild man that lives behind our house?$s#$e#I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us.

Entries.dating_Sebastian: I heard you and Sabrina are going out... she better still be coming to band practice every week!
Entries.married_Sebastian: Wow, I can't believe you and Sabrina got hitched. Times really are changing...$u#$e#Eh, it's alright, I'm sure she'll still have time to hang out.
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Maybe I should learn to play the ukelele.#$e#Abby on the congas and Sabrina on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'...$s#$e#What's the matter, you look worried.$h
Entries.Wed6: I've been friends with Sabrina for a while. She's a pretty cool girl.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.

Entries.dating_Sebastian: I heard you and Sabrina are going out... she better still be coming to band practice every week!
Entries.married_Sebastian: Wow, I can't believe you and Sabrina got hitched. Times really are changing...$u#$e#Eh, it's alright, I'm sure she'll still have time to hang out.
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Maybe I should learn to play the ukelele.#$e#Abel on the congas and Sabrina on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'...$s#$e#What's the matter, you look worried.$h
Entries.Wed6: I've been friends with Sabrina for a while. She's a pretty cool girl.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Book_Defense: What are you trying to say... I need to work out?$s#$b#Well, I'm more of a 'nimble' girl... Maybe I'll read the first half.$h
Entries.Fri_good: Oh yeah? Well, did you read the new 'Cave Saga X'? I won't spoil it for you, but oh man...$h
Entries.Sun4: I usually stay inside, but I do go to the beach now and then.#$b#Pretty much only when it's raining, though.#$e#For some reason, staring off into the bleak horizon makes me feel... I dunno. Like it's worthwhile to keep pushing on, I guess.
Entries.summer_Tue: I'm looking forward to the cold, damp season. I feel more at home.
Entries.summer_Tue4: I'm looking forward to the cold, damp season. Channeling my inner toad, I guess.$h
Entries.summer_10: Hehe... It might be funny to put something disgusting in the potluck soup tomorrow. Just don't poison anyone.#$e#Why ruin the potluck? Hmm... I guess some people feel liberated when the rigid structures of society break down a little. Maybe I'm weird.
Entries.fall_Mon: So... it's the big harvest season, isn't it?
Entries.fall_Tue: Pumpkin spice this... pumpkin spice that... man, I do get sick of these seasonal fads.
Entries.fall_Tue6: Who does Demetrius think he is, telling me what to do? He's not even my real father.$a
Entries.fall_Fri: *yawn*... I was up until 3 reading this new book...#$q 62/63 fall_Fri_old#Do you read, @?#$r 62 -30 Fri_bad#Yep. The classics.#$r 63 30 Fri_good#Only Sci-fi and Fantasy#$r 62 0 Fri_bad#I like a good Romance#$r 63 -30 Fri_bad#No, I don't read books
Entries.winter_Mon8: Do you ever think back on your old self with shame and embarrassment?#$e#I guess it's just part of growing up.
Entries.winter_Sat: The frogs aren't very happy in winter.#$e#Poor little guys.$s
Entries.winter_Sun6: I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it... yet Maru's cute little snowman goes unharmed!$a#$e#Ridiculous.

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Sebastian: Before I met you, I spent most of my time turned away from reality... because I thought I'd never find happiness.#$b#...but you've shown me that the world isn't such a dark place, after all.$h"/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "...That's one of the reasons I love you...

"/pause 1500/move Leah 0 -1 0/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "And the last one is called 'Wood Sculpture 3'. Entries.15389722/j 57: springtown/62 93/farmer 54 94 1 Lewis 62 94 0 Robin 64 93 3/skippable/move farmer 6 0 1 true/animate Robin false true 100 24 25 26 27 27 27 27 27 27 27 27/pause 200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 500/stopAnimation Robin/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "Ah, hello there, @. You showed up at the perfect time.$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/move farmer 1 0 0 true/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 200/speak Lewis "It's our new 'Special Orders' board.#$b#Robin and I built it from scratch.$h"/pause 500/speak Robin "Um... Lewis? All you did was hold the nails."/pause 300/showFrame Lewis 26/playSound slimedead/jump Lewis/shake Lewis 1000/pause 1300/showFrame Lewis 12/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "*Ahem*... Ignore her.$5"/pause 400/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "Now, let me explain..."/showFrame Lewis 20/speak Lewis "You see... with %farm Farm back in business, the local economy has really been picking up.#$b#As a result, some of the local townsfolk have been asking me for a way to source local ingredients for their businesses or personal projects."/pause 200/showFrame Lewis 8/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "So, Robin and I came up with the idea of a new 'Special Orders' board, where people can post bigger jobs than would make sense for the old billboard outside Pierre's."/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 3/move Robin 0 1 3/speak Robin "Yeah... for example, I plan on requesting some hardwood for a bed I want to make.$h#$b#I won't put you on the spot, but if you want to help me out you can just accept the job from this board.#$b#Who knows, maybe if the bed turns out well I'll start selling them in my shop!$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/quickQuestion #I look forward to helping!#Heh... I dunno... we'll see...(break)faceDirection Lewis 3\speak Lewis "I thought so! I wouldn't expect anything less from you, @."\emote Robin 20\speak Robin "So, can we say that you're... --On Board--?$4"\pause 400\showFrame Lewis 27\shake Lewis 200\pause 400\textAboveHead Lewis "*groan*"\animate Robin false true 150 32 33\pause 1200\showFrame Lewis 0\faceDirection Lewis 3\speak Lewis "Well, I'm sure you're busy, so we won't keep you away from your work any longer.#$b#As always, I appreciate your willingness to contribute!$h#$b#Take care, @."(break)faceDirection Lewis 3\emote Lewis 28\speak Lewis "Huh... I wouldn't expect such a tepid response from you, @. I'm disappointed.$s"\pause 400\speak Robin "It's fine, Lewis... there's no pressure to help out.$5#$b#Maybe I can get Sabrina to help. She could use some work away from the computer."\playMusic none\pause 500\speak Lewis "Hmmph... Well, we're done here, Robin.$u#$b#...Wouldn't want to waste any more of @'s precious 'me' time.$u"\faceDirection Lewis 1(break)/pause 2000/end
